title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, goals, and requirements by collaborating with stakeholders from various departments.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, data flow, integration points, and communication protocols. Consider the following aspects: 1) Scalability and high availability, 2) Data consistency and synchronization mechanisms, 3) Fault tolerance and error handling, 4) Security and access control, 5) Monitoring and logging, 6) Performance optimization, 7) Modular and extensible design.

title: Data Synchronization Mechanism Design
description: Design the mechanism for real-time data synchronization across multiple systems, including data flow, event handling, conflict resolution, and fault tolerance strategies.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement the database schema to store and manage synchronized data.

title: Backend Development
description: Develop the backend services and APIs for data synchronization and system integration.

title: Frontend Development
description: Develop the user interface and dashboard for monitoring and managing the synchronization process.

title: Security and Access Control
description: Implement comprehensive security measures, including authentication, authorization, data encryption, secure communication protocols, and regular security audits. Ensure compliance with industry standards and best practices for handling sensitive data.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Plan and execute comprehensive testing strategies, including unit, integration, and end-to-end testing.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment pipeline, infrastructure, and monitoring for the RealTimeSyncOrchestrator platform.

title: Documentation and Training
description: Create comprehensive documentation and training materials for users and administrators.
